uml2rca.adaptation.association

Class NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
      • core.adaptation.AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,T>
        • uml2rca.adaptation.association.AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation<java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>
          • uml2rca.adaptation.association.NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>, ITransformation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>

    public class NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation
extends AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation<java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>
    an NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML n-ary association by replacing it with the complete graph of n binary associations between the n types participating in it.

    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation, Association

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class uml2rca.adaptation.association.AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation

        associations

      • Fields inherited from class core.transformation.AbstractTransformation

        source, target

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      Creates an n-ary association to binary associations adaptation having source as its source n-ary association to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the target binary associations and cleans the post-adaptation residues.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association initTargetBinaryAssociation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source, org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Property firstEnd, org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Property secondEnd, java.lang.String newName)
      Creates a target binary association between the provided member ends designating types participating in the source n-ary association to adapt, having the same package as the source n-ary association to adapt, and named according to the provided name.
      void postTransform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      Removes the source n-ary association from the model once the complete graph of its n target binary associations has been created and added to the model to replace it, and sets the associations generated by this adaptation as its target
      java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association> transform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      Creates the complete graph of n target binary associations between the n types participating in the source n-ary association to adapt

    • Constructor Detail

      • NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation

        public NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
                                              throws NotAnNaryAssociationException
        Creates an n-ary association to binary associations adaptation having source as its source n-ary association to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the target binary associations and cleans the post-adaptation residues.
        Parameters:
        source - the source n-ary association to adapt
        Throws:
        NotAnNaryAssociationException - if the provided source entity is not an n-ary association

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association> transform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
        Creates the complete graph of n target binary associations between the n types participating in the source n-ary association to adapt
        Parameters:
        source - the source model element to transform.
        Returns:
        the target model element.

      • initTargetBinaryAssociation

        private org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association initTargetBinaryAssociation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source,
                                                                     org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Property firstEnd,
                                                                     org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Property secondEnd,
                                                                     java.lang.String newName)
        Creates a target binary association between the provided member ends designating types participating in the source n-ary association to adapt, having the same package as the source n-ary association to adapt, and named according to the provided name.
        Parameters:
        source - the source n-ary association to adapt
        firstEnd - a member end of a type participating in the source n-ary association to adapt that'll become the first member end of the target binary association
        secondEnd - a member end of a type participating in the source n-ary association to adapt that'll become the second member end of the target binary association
        newName - a value to name the target binary association
        Returns:
        the target binary association owned by the same package owning source, named newName, and having firstEnd and secondEnd as its member ends

      • postTransform

        public void postTransform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
        Removes the source n-ary association from the model once the complete graph of its n target binary associations has been created and added to the model to replace it, and sets the associations generated by this adaptation as its target
        Parameters:
        source - the source model element to transform.
